text: Aŵala ŵaakwasogoda ŵandu ŵakulipeleka pakutola sadaka syejinji mwa ŵandu ŵakulupilila, ni (kwasogoda soni) aŵala ŵangakupata (chakutola) ikaŵeje (channono cha) ukombosi wao, basi ni akuŵa ali nkwaatenda chipongwe ŵanganyao; Allah chiŵalipile pa chipongwe chaocho, soni ni akwete kupata ŵanganyao ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
